title: 10 Easy Steps to Recover Deleted Snapchat Memories

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This looks like a white ghost with a yellow background. Snapchat is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . If you aren't already logged in, enter your username and password to do so now. Use this method to recover Snapchat Memories in a downloadable file. This file is best viewed on a computer. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. This will be in the top-left corner of any of the tabs. A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap the cog in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the cog in the top-right corner. Your Settings will open.

steps.title: Tap My Data.
steps.content: Tap My Data . You can find this under the Privacy Controls header, above the Support header. [2] X Research source You may be asked to re-enter your password. You'll see a page of the data available for download.

steps.title: Toggle on "Memories" download.
steps.content: Toggle on "Memories" download. You can receive your Memories as a downloadable file. This includes your My Eyes Only photos and videos.

steps.title: Enter an email address.
steps.content: Enter an email address. Use the email address you want to use to receive the data. Make sure you have access to this email. Confirm the email address in the second field.

steps.title: Filter your data by date range (optional).
steps.content: Filter your data by date range (optional). If you only want to save data from certain timeframes, use the listed calendar months to set your date range. If you want to download all possible data, toggle the switch off.

steps.title: Tap SUBMIT REQUEST.
steps.content: Tap SUBMIT REQUEST . This is the yellow bottom at the bottom. [3] X Research source Your request will be sent to the Snapchat team. Consider backing up your Camera Roll regularly to avoid losing large amounts of data. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Open the email in a desktop browser.
steps.content: Open the email in a desktop browser. Snapchat will typically send your data within 24 hours. Check the inbox of the email you entered. You'll receive an email from Team Snapchat with a @snapchat.com email. Click the specified link in the email to open your data.

steps.title: Download the export data file.
steps.content: Download the export data file. In most cases, the data will be sent in a ZIP file. You can easily extract it by opening the file and dragging the contents onto your desktop. [5] X Research source Check for a folder that says "Memories History" in your downloaded data if you cannot find the memories you're looking for. Users have anecdotally stated that this folder has memories that they couldn't find in the rest of their Snapchat downloaded data. [6] X Research source
